DOC.brief_summary: Gather additional efficacy and safety (pharmacovigilance) information in the usual daily care in patients with Dyslipidemia on ezetimibe under real conditions in Colombia associated with statins.
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Study Evaluating The Use Of Combination Therapy Of Ezetimibe And Statins In Patients With Dyslipidemia In Colombia (0653-141)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: > 18 years old Lipid Metabolic Disorder as Per ATP III who have not reached the goals and who are on statins for at least 4 weeks Or those who require LDL reductions Over 50% to reach the ATP III goals or who need statins in accordance their risk score Pregnancy, Breast Feeding Moderate/Sever Liver Disease: Child Score > Or = To 7 Fibrates Terminal Disease Contraindications To Receive ezetimibe Contraindications To Receive Statins Mental Disability Hypersensitivity To ezetimibe On another Clinical Research Trial
